alert.note: Alert for Broome; Cayuga; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Schuyler; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 02 at 10:58PM EST until February 03 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southern Oneida County in central New York... Northern Otsego County in central New York... Southeastern Cayuga County in central New York... Chemung County in central New York... Central Tioga County in central New York... Steuben County in central New York... Tompkins County in central New York... Chenango County in central New York... Schuyler County in central New York... Northwestern Broome County in central New York... Madison County in central New York... Cortland County in central New York... Southeastern Onondaga County in central New York... * Until midnight EST. * At 1057 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from Middleville to near Freeville to near Genesee, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Ithaca, Elmira, Cortland, Sullivan, Oneida, Corning, Southport and Kirkland. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 34. New York Interstate 81 between 7 and 15. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 35 and 57. Interstate 390 near 1. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Cayuga; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Schuyler; Steuben; Tioga; Tompkins
